channel.title: Electrical Generator on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Electrical Generator on 0x000216

item.title: Power From The People To The People
item.description: Feeling a bit cranky? That’s great! Especially if you’re thinking about hand-cranking an electrical generator. It’s a way for people to create their own power. Let me clarify. Most of our devices rely on electricity or batteries. While battery technology has improved, they still require recharging. Recharging is simple at home or work. We plug in our devices and continue with our day. Sometimes, we can even charge one device through another, like a smartphone through a laptop.
